flawed_nl_solution:
After the birds ate 19 of the tomatoes Haruto has 127 - 19 = <<127-19=104>>104 tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had 104 / 2 = <<104/2=52>>52 tomatoes.
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 104. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
